translated: Kazimir Malevich was born February 23, 1878 in Kiev and died May 15, 1935 (57 years) in Leningrad, is one of the first abstract painters of the twentieth century.
original: Kasimir Malevitch né le 23 février 1878 à Kiev et mort le 15 mai 1935 (à 57 ans) à Leningrad, est un des premiers peintres abstraits du XXe siècle.
